title: Tom Pidcock Silences Doubters with Vicious Attack at AlUla Tour
content:
'Today was super important for me': Pidcock victorious in his second day of racing in his new kit to ride into pole position to win first stage race GC of his career.

Read the full article at Tom Pidcock Silences Doubters with Vicious Attack at AlUla Tour on Velo.
author: ahood
